entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
